original_text: You must not kill the animal for the Passover sacrifice in any of the towns that the Lord your God gives to you.
korean_text: 유월절 제사를 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 각 성에서 드리지 말고

sentences.original_text: You must not kill the animal
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 동물을 죽여서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God gives to you
